description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

Commodity_Code_TypeObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Commodity_Code_TypeObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Commodity_Code_TypeObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Reference to an existing Commodity Code Type for update only purposes

Commodity_Code_Type_Data.description: Reference ID for Commodity Code Type.
This is name of the Commodity Code Type and needs to be unique.
Number of characters allowed in the commodity code.  This should be the same as the sum of Level Length.

Commodity_Code_Type_Level_Data.description: Commodity Code Type is composed of multiple levels.  This attribute indicates the hierarchy order among those levels.
Number of characters in the level

validation.validation: You can't change the level length or level order when a commodity code type is already in use.
Enter a length for each level, so that the total level length equals the length for the code type.
The same Level Order cannot be used by more than one Commodity Code Type Level.
You can't change the number of levels when a commodity code type is already in use.
Enter a unique commodity code type name.
